title: GAX Axiom Definition Schema
description: Defines the structure for all General Axioms (GAX) used by the Sovereign AGI, covering logic rules and constraints.

axiomId.description: Unique immutable identifier for the axiom (e.g., 'AXIOM-0042A'). Must use specific ID format.

version.description: Monotonically increasing integer version number for the definition iteration.

status.description: Lifecycle status indicating the operational state of the axiom.

category.description: Categorization (e.g., Security, Data Integrity, Efficiency Constraint).

owner.description: Responsible core module or human agent.

definitionType.description: Specifies the syntax used in the ruleDefinition payload (what interpreter should run the rule).

scope.description: List of scope identifiers (file paths, component names, context tags) to which this axiom applies.

condition.description: The actual rule condition (syntax depends on definitionType).

action.description: The enforcement or response mechanism if the condition is met.

payload.description: Optional data payload for complex actions (e.g., transformation parameters).
